name: automation_demo
description: An example for starting a Protractor test setup with CucumberJS and TypeScript

scripts.postinstallOption: cd ./node_modules/protractor && npm i webdriver-manager && webdriver-manager update --versions.chrome 77.0.3865.40
scripts.postinstallLocal: cd ./node_modules/protractor && npm i webdriver-manager && webdriver-manager update --versions.chrome 79.0.3945.88
scripts.postinstall: cd ./node_modules/protractor && npm i webdriver-manager@latest && webdriver-manager update

author: Vui Nguyen
